caption: From then on, a person named 'guard' appeared. He often combatted crime, so the crime rate reduced greatly in the United States, but at the same time, the interests of the national defense company had been harmed. ‘Guard’ never showed up, and no one known his real identity. Ten years passed in a blink of an eye, and Charlie had grown up. Jack lived alone due to the work and rarely get together with his son. Charlie's birthday, the parents' meeting, and so on, he never attended. Finally, one day, he had the opportunity to meet his son. They chatted, played video games together, and they were very happy.
